body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting our customer service team. My name is Timothy Butler and I represent the Car Dealership Company.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello, my name is Emily Campbell.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Emily. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling relieved because your team resolved my issue with the car purchase.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm glad to hear that! Can you please provide me with your phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's five five five, two three four, eight nine one zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. And may I have your email address as well?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Emily, for sharing that information. I appreciate your time. Is there anything else I can help you with today?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for contacting us. Have a great day!
